mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_table(user_email, user_pw, user_name, role, refresh_token, alias, phone_num) VALUES (#{userEmail},#{userPw}, #{userName}, #{role}, #{refreshToken}, #{alias}, #{phoneNum})
mapper.update: UPDATE user_table SET user_email = #{userEmail}, user_pw = #{userPw}, user_name = #{userName}, role = #{role}, refresh_token = #{refreshToken}, alias = #{alias}, phone_num = #{phoneNum} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, user_email, user_pw, user_name, role, refresh_token, alias, phone_num FROM user_table
